author: Chuck Mikolajczak
title: Slowing inflation growth lifts Dow, S&P to records - Reuters
description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 closed at record levels on Wednesday, as data indicated U.S. inflation growth may have peaked, while sectors tied to economic growth advanced on the heels of the passage of a large infrastructure bill.

author: Trevor Hunnicutt
title: U.S. calls on OPEC and its allies to pump more oil - Reuters
description: U.S. President Joe Biden's top aides are pressuring OPEC and its allies to boost oil output to tackle rising gasoline prices that they see as a threat to global economic recovery.
content:
